content:
1. Sabhaye! Nithyam nin-vaathilkaavalkkaar
Saatthaanil ninnum-kaakkunnu ninne
Sheemonaadhaaram-paulooso shilpi
Yoohaanonishdan-shushrooshakkaaran
/thaaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Roohaa than veenaa-naadam daaveedaam.

2. Keeppaa mel moraan-sthhaapichaan palllli
Uchatthil kardu'-shailatthe vellum
Melaakaashatthil-meveedum shilpi
Panteeraaraakum-sthambhatthil nirtthi
/thaaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Pallllikkull peedham-nirmmichon dhanyan.
